data.description: Perl wrapper for Alan Murta's gpc library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As Alan Murta's gpc library is quite popular (so I'm told), I
    figured that a rootlevel name might not be such a bad idea. However,
    I can imagine that there are some alternatives like
    Math::Geometry::GPC or even Math::Geometry::Planar::GPC (I'm not
    that wild about lengthy names though).
